mainMenuIntro:
💎 Welcome to PNPtv! on Telegram!

Use the menu below to explore, connect, and enjoy everything PNPtv has to offer:

- Update your profile and share your location.

- Choose a membership to access the best PNP amateur content.

- Connect with members near you.

- Get support whenever you need it.
pleaseCompleteOnboarding:
⚠️ Please complete onboarding first.

Use /start to begin your journey.
error: ❌ Oops! Something went wrong. Try again in a few seconds.
mapInfo:
📍 **PNP Map**

Discover who’s nearby.

Activate your location and explore real connections around you.
liveInfo:
📡 **Live Shows**

Stream, watch, and interact in real time.

🔥 Launching soon!
helpInfo:
🤖 **PNPtv! Support**

👋 Hey there! I'm here to help you get the most out of PNPtv!

💎 **EXCLUSIVE OFFER:** Want full access to our premium content, live shows, and connect with members near you? Check out our **PRIME membership plans** — the ultimate PNP experience awaits!

**Quick Help:**
👤 /profile - Your profile
🗺️ /map - Explore nearby
📡 /live - Join live shows
💎 /subscribe - Upgrade your plan
⚙️ /admin - Admin tools

📧 **Support:** support@pnptv.app
📜 **Terms:** https://pnptv.app/terms-en

✨ **Pro Tip:** Premium members get ad-free viewing, unlimited swipes, VIP badges, and priority support! Upgrade now and join the PRIME experience! 🔥
silverFeatures:
💎 **Trial Week — $14.99**

✨ Unlock:
• 7 days full access
• All features included
• Perfect to try PNPtv

🌟 **PNP Member — $24.99/month**

✨ Unlock:
• 30 days access
• Full member experience
• Access to all features
goldenFeatures:
💎 **PNP Crystal Member — $49.99/4 months**

💫 Best Value:
• 120 days access (4 months)
• All premium features
• Save compared to monthly

💍 **PNP Diamond Member — $99.99/year**

👑 Ultimate Access:
• 365 days full access (1 year)
• Maximum savings
• VIP member status

adminMenuConfigMain:
📋 **Menu Configuration Center**

Manage all bot menus and add media to make them more engaging!

You can:
• Edit menu buttons
• Add images/videos/GIFs to menus
• Customize for each language
• Preview changes before saving
adminMenuEditMainPrompt:
🏠 **Main Menu Editor**

The main menu appears when users interact with the bot. You can customize it for each language.

Select language to edit:
adminMenuEditInstructions:
💡 **How to edit:**
Use the buttons below to add, remove, or reorder menu items.
adminMenuMediaManagerMain:
🎨 **Media Manager**

Add images, videos, or GIFs to your menus to make them more engaging!

Media will be displayed when users see the menu.
adminMenuAddMediaPrompt:
📸 **Add Media to {menuType} Menu**

Send me a photo, video, or GIF to attach to this menu.

You can also add a caption that will be shown with the menu.
adminMenuMediaInvalidType: ❌ Please send a photo, video, or GIF.
adminMenuMediaItemIdPrompt:
🏷️ **Menu Item ID**

Enter an ID for this media item:

• Use `main` or `default` for the main menu display
• Use descriptive names like `welcome`, `profile_header`, etc.

This helps you manage multiple media items.
adminMenuNoMedia:
📭 **No Media Found**

The {menuType} menu has no media attached yet.

Use "Add Media" to upload images, videos, or GIFs.
adminMenuDeleteMediaPrompt:
🗑️ **Delete Media from {menuType}**

Select the media item to delete:
adminMenuPreviewCaption:
👁️ **Preview: {menuType} Menu**

This is how your menu will look with media.
adminMenuPreviewNoMedia:
👁️ **Preview: {menuType} Menu**

No media attached. The menu will be displayed as text only.
aiChatWelcome:
🤖 **Hello! Welcome to PNPtv Support**

I'm your AI customer support assistant, here to help you with everything PNPtv!

I can assist you with:
• Membership plans & subscriptions
• Technical support & account access
• Privacy, security & legal information
• Community guidelines & wellness
• Any questions about your PNPtv experience

Feel free to ask me anything. I'm here for you 24/7! ✨

Type /endchat when you're ready to return to the main menu.
aiChatError: ❌ Sorry, something went wrong. Let's try again, or type /endchat to exit.
aiChatEnded: ✅ Chat ended. Returning to main menu...
aiChatNoAPI: 🤖 AI support is currently unavailable. Please reach out to support@pnptv.app for assistance.
aiChatRateLimit: 💫 Easy, love — let's take a breath. Give me just a moment before your next message.
